name: MHRD
summary: MHRD is a hardware design game, in which you design various hardware circuits in a hardware description language. The hardware circuits you design get more complex as you go until you create a fully functional CPU design.

name: Mhakna Gramura and Fairy Bell
summary: Written by the prolific author "Alissyn Rievegh" in her early 20's, "Mhakna Gramura and Fairy Bell" (Mhakna for short) was her foray into the children's novel genre and has been a hit classic in the Alliance ever since it's initial release. Now, the first time ever, the original text has been translated into Japanese and English and art, fully restored by ALICE IN DISSONANCE and Sekai Project.

name: MHL
summary: Draft Players, Run Practices, Execute Strategies, Sabotage the competition, Win the Cup!

name: MH-Zombie
summary: A 3D, sim-like arcade helicopter-shooter tower defense. Repair, re-arm, and upgrade your helicopter at the FARP as the battle permits. Three flight physics modes provide a stepped learning curve and wider accessibility, and the tutorial mode provides a safe learning environment.

name: M Hold'em
summary: M Hold'em is an app where you can play the mind sport “Texas Hold'em” with tramps and points.

name: M Hard
summary: You're a normal college student. Your mother needs a heart transplant. Your father's mechanics shop can't pull in nearly enough money to pay for the surgery. Just then, this rich sadistic woman shows up and makes you an offer. She'll get the best doctors and pay for the operation, IF you become her slave.

name: MH17 Strikes Back
summary: MH17 Strikes Back was a controversial game on the Google Play store which was released shortly after the Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 tragedy. The game was a simulation of the flight which was shot down by Russian separatist forces. The game has since been delisted from Google Play after backlash from various news outlets with no known archives, currently making it lost media.

name: Mhystaria
summary: Explore an island full of secrets, build your shelter, and face its challenges in this 2.5D fantasy sandbox for single or multiplayer.

name: MHZ
summary: MHZ is a multiplayer action real time strategy game (action RTS) greatly inspired by the early original pioneers of the genre. Instead of controlling an omniscient being who gives orders to units on the ground, you yourself play as one. Playing as a carrier aircraft, you must manage the construction, placement and support of your units directly on the ground. With your aircraft's pulse cannon, you have a direct impact on the battlefield. Your goal is simple: capture as much territory as you can and destroy your opponent's base.​
